title: Citi Grows Operations in Poland
summary: Warsaw - On Wednesday, Citi opened EMEA's Business Testing and Parameter Center, designed to test banking applications before they are released to consumers. The center was established as part of the Citi Center of Excellence (CoE) and is another example of Citi's expansion in Poland. Up to 80 new jobs are being created with the construction of the new center in Warsaw.
tag-2: Warsaw – On Wednesday, Citi opened EMEA's Business Testing and Parameter Center, designed to test banking applications before they are released to consumers. The center was established as part of the Citi Center of Excellence (CoE) and is another example of Citi's expansion in Poland. Up to 80 new jobs are being created with the construction of the new center in Warsaw.
tag-3: "Continuing to ensure the products and services we release to customers are of exceptional quality and user-friendly is vitally important to Citi, and that is why we are thrilled to open the EMEA Business Testing and Parameter Center in Poland," said Marc Luet, EMEA Consumer CEO. "We are also very pleased to locate the center in Poland given the local talent, Citi's existing IT centers in Łódź, Olsztyn and Warsaw, and Citi Handlowy's rich history in the country."
tag-4: "The opening of the Business Testing and Parameters Center in Poland reaffirms Citi's commitment to Poland. Our top priority is to deliver high-quality products and to constantly enhance our customers' satisfaction by continuing to innovate and remaining at the forefront of technological advances in retail banking," said Sławomir S. Sikora, Citi Handlowy CEO and Citi Country Officer.
tag-5: The center was launched within Citi's premises at 6 Goleszowska Street in Warsaw. The center delivers services to 10 countries in Citi's EMEA Consumer bank, including Czech Republic, Hungary, Russia, the United Arab Emirates and Egypt.
tag-6: The location of Citi's EMEA Business Testing and Parameters Center in Poland represents yet another example of Citi Handlowy's commitment to the country. In April, CoE's Operations Center was created in Łódź to handle loan products, telephone customer service and provide technology services for the bank. Last year, Citi Handlowy's Research and Development Center for Banking Products was created in the same city as part of the Innovative Economy Project co-funded by the European Union. This is Poland's first center of its kind. For more information on the center, please view the film on our youtube.pl channel.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.

tag-9: Citi Handlowy  Citi Handlowy is one of the major financial institutions in Poland and offers, under the Citi Handlowy brand, a broad range of state-of-the-art products in corporate, investment and consumer banking. Through its modern distribution channels and a network of over 149 branches, Bank Handlowy services 20,000 corporate customers and 965,000 individual ones. The Bank's group includes Dom Maklerski Banku Handlowego (brokerage house) and Handlowy Leasing. Being a member of Citi enables the customers of Bank Handlowy access to financial services provided in over 100 countries. Further information is available at www.citihandlowy.pl.
